sentences.en: a brief and unsuccessful flirtation with the property market
sentences.cn: 对房地产市场一时兴起、并不成功的介入

sentences.en: All her attempts to find a better job were unsuccessful; It'seemed that the dice were loaded against her.
sentences.cn: 她想找个好点的工作,可一切的努力都没成功. 她总是不顺利.

sentences.en: All my efforts ended in failure , ie were unsuccessful.
sentences.cn: 我所有的努力都失败了.

sentences.en: an unsuccessful attempt to climb Qomolangma
sentences.cn: 攀登珠穆朗玛峰的失败尝试

sentences.en: He has been unsuccessful in his attempt to win a seat on the board of the company.
sentences.cn: 他始终未能如愿以偿地在公司董事会中谋得一席之地。

sentences.en: He made an unsuccessful attempt to stop the thief.
sentences.cn: 他试图捉住小偷,但未能成功.

sentences.en: His attempts to peddle his paintings around London's tiny gallery scene proved unsuccessful.
sentences.cn: 他到伦敦小画廊兜售自己的画作，结果碰了一鼻子灰。

sentences.en: His efforts to get a job proved unsuccessful.
sentences.cn: 他求职的努力都落空了。

sentences.en: His first sortie into politics was unsuccessful.
His return showed that the struggle had been unsuccessful.
sentences.cn: 他回来这事表明那场斗争已经失败.

sentences.en: His unsuccessful senate run was his last hurrah.
sentences.cn: 这次失败的参议员竞选是他最后的尝试.

sentences.en: Like Mardi, Pierre is resoundingly unsuccessful, and curiously memorable.
sentences.cn: 和《玛地》一样, 《皮埃尔》失败得非常惨, 可是出奇地让人难以忘记.

sentences.en: Soapy, with disgust in his heart, loafed along, twice unsuccessful.
sentences.cn: 索比心里十分憎恶, 只得拖着脚步, 重新开始游荡.他再一次失算了.

sentences.en: The difference between successful and unsuccessful people is that successful people put into practice the things they learn.
sentences.cn: 成功者与失败者的区别在于成功者能够学以致用。

sentences.en: The unsuccessful crosses involved two species belonging to different series.
sentences.cn: 未成功的杂交组合都属非同族的两个种.

trans.tran_cn: 不成功的，失败的，碌碌无为
trans.tran_en: not having a successful result or not achieving what you wanted to achieve
